h2.span: Gadsden Independent School District Header News Feed

a.title: How to download and fill the registration PDF form

strong.a: How to download and fill the registration PDF form

p.strong: With the "Stay at Home Order" in place registration has shifted to remote registration instead of going to the school building to register a student. The district has provided a link on the District website whereby parents can access the form used to register your son/daughter. Fill out the form and return to ycasillas@gisd.k12.nm.us at which time the student will be registered and the information sent to the school for a schedule to be added.

Con la "Orden de quedarse en casa", el registro se ha cambiado a registro remoto en lugar de ir al edificio de la escuela para registrar a un estudiante. El distrito ha proporcionado un enlace en el sitio web del Distrito donde los padres pueden acceder al formulario utilizado para registrar a su hijo / hija. Complete el formulario y envíelo a ycasillas@gisd.k12.nm.us
por medio de esto el estudiante será registrado y la información enviada a la escuela para que se agregue un horario.

u.span: Governor: K-12 school closings must continue to prevent potential spread of COVID-19

div.p: The Gadsden Independent School District will ensure that all students will learn by putting education first. The district will provide quality educational opportunities conducive to learning that will facilitate students' individual goals.

div.aria-label: Interview with NMAA Executive Director Sally Marquez April 13 2020

h2.span: Interview with NMAA Executive Director Sally Marquez April 13 2020

div.p: All new employees hired during the year must attend a mandatory orientation of the district’s benefits. New employees who do not attend the appropriate orientation must wait for the next scheduled orientation date which may result in a delay in benefits enrollment. These meetings are usually a minimum of three hours in duration.
All new substitute teachers hired during the year must attend a mandatory orientation.
The substitute application process must be complete in order to attend.

Board Member/Employee Disclosure Pursuant to the
New Mexico Governmental Conduct Act

td.p: The Gadsden Independent School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups.

span.strong: The following person(s) has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies:

td.p:
Section 504 Coordinator Barbara Browder,
Executive Associate Superintendent for Human Resources
4950 McNutt Road Sunland Park,
NM 88063 575-882-6200

Title IX Coordinator Rosa Hood,
Director of Secondary Schools
4950 McNutt Road Sunland Park,
NM 88063 575-882-6200
